{"id":865671547,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 5 days","timestamp":1672045564,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"11 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/865671547/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"8.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string convert(string s, int numRows) {\n        if(numRows == 1) return s;\n        int l = s.length();\n        string ans = \"\";\n        int n = numRows;\n        for(int j=0; j<n; j++){\n            int i = 0;\n            while(i < l){\n                if(i + j < l)\n                    ans += s[i + j];\n\n                if((i+j) + 2*(n-j-1) < l && j!=0 && j!=n-1){\n                    ans += s[i+j + 2*(n-j-1)];\n                }\n                i = i + 2*(n-1);\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
